alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued August 31 at 3:01AM PDT until August 31 at 9:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM PDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...Ventura County Beaches, Ventura County Inland Coast, Malibu Coast, Los Angeles County Beaches and Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles. * WHEN...Until 9 AM PDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Very low visibility will create dangerous driving conditions. Travel delays may occur at airports. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Roadways affected by dense fog include Pacific Coast Highway, the 10, 105, 110, 405, 605, and 710 freeways in Los Angeles County, and Highway 101 in Ventura County.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Malibu Coast; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast
